evidence.text: When I try to find a provider, it tells me the system is updating and try again in 1-2 hours. I've been trying for two weeks.
The app does not work at all. Once you log in, if you try to do anything it'll load for quite some time then says try again.
It's mind blowing how little this app works. I tap to view my ID card an not a single button works, not even the back button!
Terrible design and poor value - The app terrible to navigate, glitches often, and doesn't show relevant information about coverage
This App DOESNT WORK - Nothing ever loads, I am forced to use the mobile site
Coverage Tab Freezes App - This critical bug has been present for over two months with no fix, making the app unreliable and frustrating to use

The app feels very old, the UI is not optimized and it feels like a website, not an app. I am stumbling upon bugs very often. Please work on the design of your app to make it friendly and pleasant to use. I regret already switching banks.
Won't load. Lately, after confirming my Face ID, the app gets stuck on a loading screen. I reinstalled the app and it let me log in a total of one time before getting stuck in the same loop again.

They changed so you can't pay your mortgage on the app anymore, and make you sign in from a pc is the only way. Also etranfers take like 1-2 business day and are not instant like other banking apps. Can't see anything other than balances, making this a useless app.
Since the new update the functionality for investment viewing is limited at best. Unable to view my individual investments any more. Only able to see the total.
This app used to be amazing up until they did the big overhaul on it. I hate that I don't just have my claims and balances right up front and center.
I have been using sunlife since 3 years. I can login to their website but I have not been able to login to their app since few months. THIS IS THE WORST APP I HAVE USED.
Truly unusable bank. They let you get a credit card, but then there's so way to actually log in because the security verification system is utterly broken

After I get downgraded from Citi gold to regular Citi account, the app lost all my account information. When I log in, the only thing I can see is my credit card. I can't see my checking account, saving account, and linked account— the app lost all that information!
For the past month, I haven't been able to enter the amount when using Zelle in the app on my iPhone 12 Pro. The keyboard appears, but the numbers don't register when I type.
The latest upgrade is awful and a step backwards. It lacks basic functionality such as cash balances in each account
This last update 6.59.1 is a mess. The stock overview is garbage. You have to decrypt how many shares you have. They took out the flag of origin to replace it with the company's logos
Much cleaner look, but still no dark mode
Cannot login! Always have technical difficulties!! Even after updating the app it still doesn't fix the problem, seriously considering changing to other bank
I can't express how frustrating this app is. The poor performance is for absolutely no reason. To be performing the way RBC mobile does with the advanced technology that we have is embarrassing
Why am I keep getting 'we are having technical difficulties …' whenever I look at my existing option position?

App won't open after Jan 2026 update - Since the most recent update, the app gets an error before even allowing one to login. Despite removing and reinstalling, the app is still completely unusable since it won't even allow a login.

Every time I attempt to log in on the mobile app now it's forces me through the password changing process. Even if I change it, close it, I have to change it again and I am never able to actually see any of my banking information.
It's 2026 and you can't transfer money to an external account on the app without going to a browser or desktop. Most banking apps do this. Pathetic really considering this is BofA.
I try to login and it keep failing to connect
I have tried everything and I cant get the app to work. Unable to connect to authentication service.
This app does not let you file a claim
OTC process is weak: Have to hunt for finding stores and eligible products. No clear camera bar code scan option
App is useless: Can't find anything I want, including in-network providers.
Don't bother: I can't find year end summary; can't find out if an optometrist is in network; can't find out if my letter of necessity has been received. App is useless for me right now

Every time I get to my cart there is always an issue! Every month I go through the same thing. It changes prices and availability. I am so tired of this nonsense. It takes an hour to finally get the order to submit.
Manual login every time: Every time I need to enter my credentials. Faceid never works for me. FACEID is basic feature with any app. Not sure UHC can't handle faceid at all

DENIAL OF COVERAGE FOR 6 DAY SERIOUS HOSPITAL STAY‼️ I WILL NOT RENEW MY MEMBERSHIP WITH UHC NEXT FALL 2026 FOR 2027‼️I will advise everybody I know to reject any and all Medicare Advantage proposals made by UHC‼️
App sucks and so does company for any resolve to medical claim reimbursement emails get ignored, follow is no existent
Cannot login to my account for weeks now
Need to find an urgent care that covers me, and according to this app, no urgent cares in the country take my insurance. The map feature just seems to be completely broken
App has stopped working! Won't let me log in!
About 2 months ago the app completely quit working. It's up to date and I'm just waiting for a new update to hopefully fix this issue at this point.
Doesn't Work After Updating app… Please fix the issue with the App not moving past the login screen! It was working fine until I hit update.
New version is useless….it will will not load. Now I cannot get into my bank account. App needs to be fixed! This has been like this since the new update occurred! FIX IT!!!
New update keeps crashing app - Just updated to newest version and can sign in without an issue. But when I try to click on anything in the app, it crashes.
The latest version has caused the 'table of contents', (ie: if you tap the top left 'three bars') on the home page, to not display properly on my iPad. This has never happened before.
New version is useless….it will will not load. Now I cannot get into my bank account. This has been like this for weeks! Get your act together!

Cannot get online as need code. Cannot receive code as phone number no longer valid. Cannot change phone number as cannot get online to change, and cannot contact TD America for help as they 'are busy'. Have waited hours for callback.
The customer service in usa (dial 0) very rude, and crisis. Unacceptable, don't know why those can be work in the big bank make very bag image to the bank.
App works great but can't get the '$45 Bonus Offer' to stop popping up despite hitting the decline button every time
The screen for my credit card is always laggy. All other parts of the app work perfectly though

You might want to make it iOS 16 compatible. Lots of people, including myself, are still using older apple devices, like iPad Pro or Air. Limiting this to iOS 17 is not really caring about your customers
Very poor user interface!: The Marcus app is slow and clunky. On the positive side, there's lots of room for improvement!!
January 2026-Will not open until updated: I'll always give 1 star to an app that it's unusable until you update it. I should be able to see my balance no matter what.
Does not cater to other languages: I've been a customer for over a year now. And while I like the app, I'm giving it a low rating because I'm quite unhappy with the company.

This application is impossible. It is hard to get into. Passwords have to be constantly changed & the app shuts down telling you something went wrong. Something always goes wrong! You CANNOT look for doctors easily. Nothing is easy on this app
the app crashes when I try to checkout from the prescription cart
Why on earth would you remove wellness tracking from the app??? Latest update no longer tracks steps from apple health ap
What a great idea to be able to pay in 4 payment after a big purchase. Thank you chase.
Every time I try to log into my app… Even if it's to do business outside of my credit card… It comes up with this screen, asking me if I want to split purchases or pay them overtime or something.
Horrible $25 for monthly service, from even an ex-employee and account holder since 25+ years. Even though paperless fee is charged. No interest payment on checking plus savings account.

Chase took over my Washington Mutual account. I once opened a trust account, stated I didn't know when it would be funded. Asked if I need to put some cash in the account to keep it active and was told no. When I deposited funds, the account was closed due to lack of activity.
It's very annoying because I can't get rid of the screen without hitting the button or somehow activatin
Powerful and Easy to Use: This is a great financial app. It is intuitive and well designed. Navigation is easy and I can do 95% of what I need on the app
Wells Fargo app is a smooth and lucrative tool for every human
The app is accessible, using ScreenReader software for the blind. They have done a really good job with the app
The Truist app is a mature and thorough app. I enjoy using it.
Truist has done a great job with the app. Easy to use and navigate and I can conduct most of my banking tasks
Excellent because it is user friendly even for hopeless computer users like me.
